events.long_description: Team up with 5 other friends to compete to be the best in your region. This event will occur over 3 days, with 3 different rounds. The first day will be completely open, and teams can play up to 15 matches. The top 128 scores will advance to the next day. Day 2 the top 128 will battle it out against each other and play a maximum of 10 matches, where the top 32 will advance. The final day will see the top 32 teams battle it out against each other.

events.short_description: Each day is a separate tournament!
events.long_description: The Fortnite Celebration Cup Solo competition will take place on Saturday, February 15 and Sunday, February 16. Players will have an opportunity to earn in-game items like the Tango Outfit, Wild Accent pickaxe, and the Take Cover spray on February 15. Then progress resets, and players will have the opportunity to earn a share of the $1,000,000 prize pool on February 16! Both days are open to all eligible PlayStation 4 Fortnite players. 2FA and account level 15+ required. For complete details, check out our Official Rules at https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library

events.short_description: Compete for an opportunity to win the new Tart Tycoon Outfit, gaming hardware, and exclusive apparel!
events.long_description: These are the last days of the entire Fortnite community being able to cross-play with each other until victory. Full details and official rules at fn.gg/FreeFortniteCup. PLEASE NOTE: The Victory Royale scoring text below is slightly bugged. Victory Royales are worth 10 points, and every 3 minutes spent in a match is worth 1 point.

events.short_description: Welcome to the SypherPK Cup - an opportunity to win the SypherPK Bundle before it lands in the item shop!
events.long_description: Trap Tower eliminations will not only be counted on the main leaderboard, but will also be tracked on an additional Trap Tower elimination leaderboard. Both leaderboards will award prizes at the conclusion of this event! For more details, see: fn.gg/SypherPKCup2022

events.short_description: Compete against other PlayStation players for an opportunity to earn a cash prize and the Blue Striker Sprint spray!
events.long_description: This event occurs across multiple stages. Top players at the end of each Qualifier will advance to the Finals. Qualifier 1 will utilize "Wild Storm" game rules. Qualifier 2 and Finals will use standard Battle Royale game rules. For more details and official rules, visit: https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/en-US/rules-library

events.short_description: Place into one of three weekly divisions in this seasonal kick off!
events.long_description: Gain access to this cup by reaching the Contender Rank in Arena. The top 1,400 teams at the end of Round 1 will advance to Round 2. The top 200 teams from Round 2 will be assigned to the Elite Division; the next 800 teams will be assigned to the Challenger Division; and all other players will be assigned into the Contender Division. The Placement Cup will be region locked. For more details see https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library

events.short_description: Hop in Queasy's own tournament!
events.long_description: The top 33 Trios on the Leaderboard at the end of Round 1, will advance to Round 2. Full details: fn.gg/QueasyCup

events.short_description: Throw away your blueprints and compete with your teammate for bragging rights!
events.long_description: Compete for bragging rights in this shorter format tournament. For more details, see: https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library

events.short_description: The second stage of your divisional progress!
events.long_description: Gain access to this Divisional cup by qualifying from the Placement Cup or a Contender Cup. The top teams from each cup will advance to the Elite Division and be eligible to play in the next Elite Cups. Teammates must be in the same Divisional tier to compete together. For more details, see https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library

events.short_description: Begin your divisional competition here!
events.long_description: Gain access to this Divisional cup by earning Contender rank in Battle Royale Arena. The top teams from each cup will advance to the Challenger Division and be eligible to play in the next Challenger Cups. Teammates must be in the same Division tier to compete together. For more details see https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library

events.short_description: The Elite Cup Weekly Final is within reach!
events.long_description: Gain access to this divisional cup by qualifying from the Placement Cup or a Challenger Cup. Qualification to the Elite Cup Weekly Final is based on your performance across both Elite Cups each week. Teammates must be in the same tier of Cup to compete together. For more details, see: https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library

events.long_description: This event has cash prizes and is available for all eligible players. This tournament occurs across one round. Full details are available at www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/news.

events.short_description: No builds, but all the attention.
events.long_description: Compete in the Polo Stadium Cup for a chance to earn the Polo Stadium Collection Set before they hit the Shop! This event will utilize the Zero Build game rules. For more details see fn.gg/PoloCup

events.short_description: Hop in this celebratory tournament for an opportunity to win the new FNCS in-game outfit early!
events.long_description: This event is open to all eligible players. Form a duo and play in this single-round tournament to win early access to the new FNCS outfit before it hits the item shop! Full rules and details can be found at https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library

events.short_description: Welcome to the FNCS Invitational 2022! Compete for your share of the $1,000,000 prize pool!
events.long_description: Congrats - you've been invited to the FNCS Invitational 2022! Compete in this years pinnacle event live in Raleigh, NC. The Invitational adds scores from each session accross two days of play. Please see the Invitational 2022 Player Discord for full rules and details. Please seek out an admin if you have any questions or concerns during the event.

events.short_description: CONSOLE DUOS!
events.long_description: Compete for an opportunity to earn a share of the $250,000 prize pool. This tournament will be played over 4 rounds with the top teams advancing each round. Full rules and details: http://fn.gg/C3S4ConsoleCup

events.short_description: Compete against other PlayStation players for an opportunity to earn a cash prize and the Guffed spray!
events.long_description: This event occurs across multiple stages. Top players at the end of each Qualifier will advance to the Finals. For more details and official rules, visit: https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/en-US/rules-library

events.short_description: Place into one of three weekly divisions in this seasonal kick off!
events.long_description: Gain access to this cup by reaching the Contender Rank in Arena. For EU, OCE, ASIA, ME, and BR - the top 1,400 teams at the end of Round 1 will advance to Round 2. The top 200 teams from Round 2 will be assigned to the Elite Division; the next 1000 teams will be assigned to the Challenger Division; and all other players will be assigned into the Contender Division. For NAE and NAW - the top 1,400 teams at the end of Round 1 will advance to Round 2. The top 100 teams from Round 2 will be assigned to the Elite Division; the next 500 teams will be assigned to the Challenger Division; and all other players will be assigned into the Contender Division. The Placement Cup will be region locked. The region you participate in for Placement Cup will be the same for all of Divisional Play. For more details see https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library

events.short_description: Saddle up alone and compete with a new teammate each game for bragging rights!
events.long_description: Compete for bragging rights in this shorter format tournament. Each game you will queue up as a solo and be paired with a matchmade teammate! Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled and an account level of 15 or greater. For more details see: https://www.epicgames.com/fortnite/competitive/rules-library

events.short_description: Survive, collect coins and complete minigames for your opportunity to win $1,000,000
events.long_description: Survive, collect coins and complete minigames for your opportunity to win $1,000,000 and the Beast Brella! Only your highest scoring match counts. You have 3 hours to get as high a score as possible.  Players must be at least 13 years old (or such other age, if greater, as may be required in their country of residence), have MFA enabled and an account level of 15 or greater. For more details see: https://fn.gg/MrBeastSurvChallenge
